H0.text: What was the name of the American doctor who in 2011 was sentenced to four years in Jail after being convicted of the involuntary manslaughter of pop star Michael Jackson . Arnold Klein

H1.text: What was the name of the American doctor who in 2011 was sentenced to four years in Jail after being convicted of the involuntary manslaughter of pop star Michael Jackson . Brian Oxman

H2.text: What was the name of the American doctor who in 2011 was sentenced to four years in Jail after being convicted of the involuntary manslaughter of pop star Michael Jackson . David Adams

H3.text: What was the name of the American doctor who in 2011 was sentenced to four years in Jail after being convicted of the involuntary manslaughter of pop star Michael Jackson . Conrad Murray

A4.text: He was convicted of involuntary manslaughter in Michael Jackson's death for having inadvertently overdosed him with a powerful surgical anesthetic, propofol.

A5.text: Murray served just under two years out of his original four-year prison sentence.

A6.text: He received the maximum penalty of four years in prison.

A7.text: Murray was formally charged with involuntary manslaughter in February 2011.
